cluster_information.name: Energy EVSE Mode
cluster_information.description: This cluster is derived from the Mode Base cluster which also defines a namespace for the operation of EVSE devices.

derived_datatypes.name: ModeTag
derived_datatypes.description: The derived cluster specific ModeTag values.

enum_values.name: Manual
enum_values.description: While in this mode, the EVSE needs to be sent an EnableEvseCharging or EnableEvseDischarging command to make the EVSE start charging or discharging.

enum_values.name: TimeOfUse
enum_values.description: While in this mode, the EVSE will attempt to automatically start charging based on the user's charging targets and a Time of Use tariff to charge at the cheapest times of the day.

enum_values.name: SolarCharging
enum_values.description: While in this mode, the EVSE will attempt to automatically start charging based on available excess solar PV generation, limiting the charging power to avoid imported energy from the grid.

mode_constraints.description: The table below lists the changes relative to the Mode Base cluster for the fields of the ModeOptionStruct type.
requirements: At least one entry in the SupportedModes attribute SHALL include the Manual mode tag in the ModeTags field list.
